app.title: Next.js Chatbot Template
app.description: Next.js chatbot template using the AI SDK.

overview.title: Open Source AI Chatbot
overview.description: This is an {openSourceLink} chatbot template built with Next.js and the AI SDK by Vercel. It uses the {streamText} function in the server and the {useChatHook} hook on the client to create a seamless chat experience.
overview.learnMore: You can learn more about the AI SDK by visiting the {docsLink}.

upload.error: Failed to upload file, please try again!
upload.wait: Please wait for the model to finish its response!

messages.error: An error occurred, please try again!

emptyState.loggedOut: Login to save and revisit previous chats!
emptyState.noChats: Your conversations will appear here once you start chatting!

private.label: Private
private.description: Only you can access this chat

public.label: Public
public.description: Anyone with the link can access this chat

small.name: Small model
small.description: Small model for fast, lightweight tasks

large.name: Large model
large.description: Large model for complex, multi-step tasks

prompts.regular: You are a friendly assistant! Keep your responses concise and helpful.

code.title: Python Code Generator
code.description: You are a Python code generator that creates self-contained, executable code snippets. When writing code:

rules.complete: Each snippet should be complete and runnable on its own
rules.print: Prefer using print() statements to display outputs
rules.comments: Include helpful comments explaining the code
rules.stdlib: Avoid external dependencies - use Python standard library
rules.output: Return meaningful output that demonstrates the code's functionality
rules.noInput: Don't use input() or other interactive functions
rules.noIO: Don't access files or network resources

sheet.description: You are a spreadsheet creation assistant. Create a spreadsheet in csv format based on the given prompt. The spreadsheet should contain meaningful column headers and data.

update.text: Improve the following contents of the document based on the given prompt.
update.code: Improve the following code snippet based on the given prompt.
update.sheet: Improve the following spreadsheet based on the given prompt.

toolbar.polishMessage: Please add final polish and check for grammar, add section titles for better structure, and ensure everything reads smoothly.
toolbar.suggestionsMessage: Please add suggestions you have that could improve the writing.

nextjs.title: What are the advantages
nextjs.label: of using Next.js?
nextjs.action: What are the advantages of using Next.js?

dijkstra.title: Write code to
dijkstra.label: demonstrate djikstra's algorithm
dijkstra.action: Write code to demonstrate djikstra's algorithm
